t: Shop with Points Servicing Page

t: Amazon Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Points can be used to pay for purchases made on the Amazon.co.jp website. Each Amazon Point is worth ¥1 when used to buy any item.

t: Prime Visa and Amazon Visa Rewards Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Points earned on purchases after the close of each qualifying Daily Rewards posting are generally available to be used the same day; however, points earned on purchases after the close of the last qualifying Daily Rewards posting, may take up to one additional day to become available.
